pullRequest.title: Assume tests container is started immediately
pullRequest.bodyText: Assume tests container is started immediately

nodes.bodyText: Add rationale to commit message and/or the code.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -276,10 +274,7 @@ private Environment getEnvironment()
                                                 .build()))
                                 .addAll(testArguments)
                                 .addAll(reportsDirOptions(reportsDirBase))
-                                .build().toArray(new String[0]))
-                        // this message marks that environment has started and tests are running
-                        .waitingFor(forLogMessage(".*\\[TestNG] Running.*", 1)
-                                .withStartupTimeout(ofMinutes(15)));
+                                .build().toArray(new String[0]));

commit.message:
Assume tests container is started immediately

There is no other container that is waiting for test container. Also
test container do not expose any kind of services that other containers
could use. Hence waiting to be sure that testng process reached certain
point is not needed.

Additionally, recently Wait.forLogMessage() appeared to be flaky and
sometimes it failed to mark test container as started.

Without Wait.forLogMessage() container is immediately marked as started.
